alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jones, central Craven, eastern Onslow and west central Carteret Counties through 930 PM EST... At 859 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Rhems to near Onslow Beach. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Camp Lejeune Center, River Bend, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, Cape Carteret, Maysville, Silverdale, Kellum, Midway Park, Tuscarora, Belgrade, Rhems, Kuhns, Peletier, and Bogue. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EST for eastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Southern Craven; West Carteret
